verses.name: Matthew 6:25
verses.text: Therefore I say unto you, Take no thought for your life, what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink; nor yet for your body, what ye shall put on. Is not the life more than meat, and the body than raiment?

verses.name: Matthew 6:26
verses.text: Behold the fowls of the air: for they sow not, neither do they reap, nor gather into barns; yet your heavenly Father feedeth them. Are ye not much better than they?

verses.name: Matthew 6:27
verses.text: Which of you by taking thought can add one cubit unto his stature?
